com.pizzaserver.domain.model

Class CheckoutDiscountCalculate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pizzaserver.domain.model.CheckoutDiscountCalculate

  • public class CheckoutDiscountCalculate
extends java.lang.Object
    Class called by CheckoutCalculate, it's used to calculate discounts of order and final cost after discounts

    discountHalfPrice - true if order has 2 same pizzas (discount type 1)

    discountFreeDrink - true if order has 2 same pizzas and drink - results in free drink (combines with discountHalfPrice)

    discountRealDeal - true if order is over 100z≈Ç - results in order cheaper by 20% of its price

    pizzaCount - pizzas count

    discountHPlist - list of products with HalfPrice discount

    OrderListProduct - discountFDid

    totalCost - order total cost before discount

    totalCostDiscount - order total cost after discount
